PLs buddy.Such  huge torrent and only few seeding hours.I respect your sharing will.I salute you.But it would be better  if you upload little lighter torrents;so that at least anyone (other) can sget complete file in that day or within 2/3 days so that he would be the seeder in your absence.

And last but not least;
it would be far far better  if you will describe about the files too.(For example in case of this torrrent which-which songs do you have),
THANKS
